title: OPSS Regulatory Leaders Graduate Scheme University Careers Fair

content.text: Are you a recent graduate or in your final year of university?
Looking to kick-start your career in a role where you can make a real difference?
Join us at an upcoming university careers fair to connect with our scheme experts and discover how you can help protect consumers from product-related harm.
Our graduate scheme is open to applicants from all disciplines with a 2:2 degree or above.

Visit our stand to explore opportunities where you can contribute to a mission that matters, whether you are passionate about protecting consumers, shaping public policy or solving real-world challenges.
Sign up here to receive updates when the scheme opens.
Explore our Careers site to learn more about our teams and the difference they make every day.
